item.title: Compensation-Productivity Gap–Mixing Spatial and Trade Network Dependency Approach (WP)
item.description: This paper was presented in the 58th Annual Meetings of Southern Regional Science Association held on March 15 – 17, 2018 at Philadelphia, PA Courtyard Philadelphia Downtown. This paper is still under development.
